Articles.Content:
I know many of these type of craft have been posted before, but each update to KSP sees more and more of them become obsolete as they become incompatible with the latest incarnation of our favourite game.

This iteration of a rocket for going to Mun uses stock parts, built in v 1.1.2.  Having said that, it should be noted that I use the Kerbal Joint Reinforcement mod in all my saves as I grew tired of over-strutting my rockets to combat the 'wet noodle' syndrome that plagues the un-modded game.  As a consequence, I have not flown this craft without the KJR mod so cannot vouch for how stable it will be without it.

It should also be noted that the craft itself is not a true Apollo replica; rather the flight profile and method of getting to the Mun and back is based on what was done in the Apollo program.

Craft file on Dropbox

The video is annotated to show the key points and Action Group keys used during the flight.

 

Edited June 13, 2016 by Scarecrow
